tafsirQuiz.question: What does this verse warn or promise?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The scenes of Doomsday cannot either be revealed in reality or truly described in the present world. When Doomsday arrives, it will be so terrible that man will forget this relations and the interests to which he gives the utmost importance today and for which he ignores the Truth
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse explains the rules of inheritance

tafsirQuiz.question: What warning or glad tiding is mentioned in Surah Al-Ma'arij, Ayah 15?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: These verses give a brief description of the qualities of two types of human beings: those who will be treated as entitled to enter Paradise and those whose deeds will cause them to be thrown into Hell on Doomsday
distractors: This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers
This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets

tafsirQuiz.question: What consequence is described in this ayah?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Their unreasonable behaviour will take them straight to Hell, but with their false optimism, they go on thinking that they are fast approaching Paradise
distractors: This verse talks about the stories of previous prophets
This verse discusses the creation of the universe
This verse describes the characteristics of believers

tafsirQuiz.question: Which concept is emphasized in Surah Al-Ma'arij, Ayah 40?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: The periodic change in the places where the sun rises and sets on the earth’s horizon is due to that unique feature of the earth known as the axial tilt
distractors: This verse narrates a historical event
This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous

tafsirQuiz.question: What key concept does this verse highlight?
tafsirQuiz.correctAnswer: Those who, in spite of such clear signs, do not learn any lessons are undoubtedly frivolous people. In this world when there is the example of an inferior thing being improved upon, the occurrence of similar other events is quite within the realm of the possible
distractors: This verse warns about the punishment of disbelievers
This verse promises paradise to the righteous
This verse narrates a historical event
